name: Raging Fireball
description:
Hello and welcome. I hope you enjoy this game. I made this breakout game with Game Maker Studio and was designed to be a relaxing game. 

The music was made by Kevin Mcleaod, I guess many of you know who he is. In this first version, for the Game Jam, there ir only one music, I didn't want to made a game with several MB to be downloaded yet.

Comments are welcome. :)
